item.title: ASML 2026 年增长前景取决于第二季度的预订情况
item.description: 投资者希望，当这家全球最大的芯片制造设备供应商在本周三公布第二季度财报时，ASML 的预订量足以支持其 2026 年的增长目标。【原文：Investors are hoping that ASML's bookings are robust enough to support its 2026 growth ambitions when the world's biggest chip-making equipment supplier reports its second-quarter earnings on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日产称奥帕玛工厂将于 2027/28 财年末停产
item.description: 日产汽车公司周二表示，该公司将于 2028 年 3 月底之前停止日本 Oppama 工厂的汽车生产，并将业务转移到九州的工厂。【原文：Nissan Motor Co will cease vehicle production at its Oppama plant in Japan by the end of March 2028 and transfer operations to its factory in Kyushu, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 半年业绩喜人，TomTom 调高 2025 年指导目标下限
item.description: 荷兰数字地图专家 TomTom 周二上调了全年收入指导区间的下限，称尽管面临市场逆风，但 2025 年上半年的业绩好于最初预期。【原文：Dutch digital mapping specialist TomTom lifted the bottom end of its full-year revenue guidance range on Tuesday, saying its results in the first half of 2025 were better than it had initially expected despite market headwinds.】

item.title: 爱立信第二季度调整后营业利润超出预期
item.description: 瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信周二公布的第二季度调整后营业利润高于预期，并表示将增加对人工智能的投资。【原文：Swedish telecom equipment maker Ericsson reported on Tuesday a bigger second-quarter adjusted operating profit than expected and said it would increase investments into AI.】

item.title: 贝森特缺席，金砖国家紧张局势将给德班 G20 会议蒙上阴影
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的再次缺席、唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税威胁以及华盛顿与金砖五国（BRICS）之间日益加剧的紧张局势都将给本周在南非德班举行的二十国集团（G20）财长会议蒙上阴影。【原文：Another no-show by U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Donald Trump's tariff threats and rising tensions between Washington and BRICS countries all look set to overshadow this week's meeting of G20 finance chiefs in Durban, South Africa.】

item.title: 对欧洲而言，美国 30% 的关税将打击贸易，迫使欧洲重新思考出口模式
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要对欧洲商品征收 30% 的关税，一旦实施，将改变欧洲的游戏规则，使跨大西洋贸易全军覆没，并迫使欧洲重新思考其出口导向型经济模式。【原文：The 30% tariff on European goods threatened by U.S. President Donald Trump would, if implemented, be a game-changer for Europe, wiping out whole chunks of transatlantic commerce and forcing a rethink of its export-led economic model.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美国财报将揭示关税影响
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 印度 HCLTech 因年度营业利润率预期下降而下滑
item.description: 印度第三大软件服务提供商 HCLTech 下调了其年度营业利润率预期，从而抑制了整个行业客户支出反弹的希望。【原文：Shares of HCLTech dropped about 4% on Tuesday, a day after India's No. 3 software services provider lowered its annual operating margin forecast, dampening hopes of a rebound in client spending across the sector.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国 Starling 银行考虑在纽约上市，实施美国发展计划
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，斯特林银行正在考虑在纽约上市，作为其美国扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Starling Bank is considering a listing in New York as part of its expansion plans in the United States, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，美国人工智能初创企业融资激增，而更多风险投资基金却举步维艰
item.description: PitchBook周二发布的一份报告显示，得益于人工智能的持续繁荣，2025年上半年美国初创企业的融资额激增了75.6%，有望成为有史以来融资额第二高的一年，尽管风险投资公司在融资方面举步维艰。【原文：U.S. startup funding surged 75.6% in the first half of 2025, thanks to the continued AI boom, putting it on track for its second-best year ever, even as venture capital firms struggled to raise money, a report from PitchBook on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 预计美国 6 月通胀率将随着关税推动的物价上涨而上升
item.description: 美国消费者价格在 6 月份可能有所回升，这可能标志着人们期待已久的、由关税引发的通胀开始上升，这使得美联储对恢复降息持谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. consumer prices likely picked up in June, potentially marking the start of a long-anticipated, tariff-induced increase in inflation that has left the Federal Reserve cautious about resuming its interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 特斯拉将在印度销售起价为 69,766 美元的 Model Y 汽车
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司网站上的价格目录显示，其 Model Y 汽车将在印度销售，起价为 600 万卢比。【原文：Elon Musk's Tesla will sell its Model Y cars in India starting at 6 million rupees, a price catalogue on its website showed.】

item.title: SpaceX 预计从第四季度开始在越南推出 Starlink 服务
item.description: 越南国家媒体周二援引一位政府官员的话称，SpaceX 预计将从今年第四季度开始在越南发射 Starlink 卫星互联网服务。【原文：SpaceX is expected to launch Starlink satellite internet services in Vietnam from the fourth quarter of this year, state media cited a government official as saying on Tuesday.】

item.title: 台积电季度利润飙升创纪录，但特朗普关税和外汇问题令人担忧
item.description: 台积电（TSMC）是全球先进人工智能芯片的主要生产商，预计其第二季度利润将增长 52%，达到创纪录水平，但美国关税和强劲的台币汇率可能会对其前景造成影响。【原文：TSMC , the world's main producer of advanced AI chips, is expected to post a 52% jump in second-quarter profit to record levels, though U.S. tariffs and a strong Taiwan dollar could weigh on its outlook.】

item.title: 宝马与 Momenta 合作，共同开发适合中国国情的驾驶辅助技术
item.description: 宝马集团周二宣布，将与中国自动驾驶公司 Momenta 合作，专门为中国市场开发先进的辅助驾驶技术。【原文：BMW Group announced on Tuesday that it would join hands with Chinese autonomous driving firm Momenta to develop advanced driving assistance technology specifically for the China market.】

item.title: VIEW 中国第二季度 GDP 同比增长 5.2%，高于市场预期
item.description: 中国第二季度经济增速略高于预期，显示出在美国关税面前的韧性，但分析师警告说，不利因素正在加剧，这将增加决策者推出更多刺激措施的压力。【原文：China's economy grew at a slightly faster pace than expected in the second quarter, showing resilience in the face of U.S. tariffs, though analysts warn of intensifying headwinds that will ramp up pressure on policymakers to roll out more stimulus.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，美元在美国财报公布前走强；日本国债收益率飙升
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市攀升，美元保持涨势，原因是贸易谈判仍是本周的焦点，美国通胀和银行盈利的关键数据将在本周公布。【原文：Asian shares climbed and the dollar held gains on Tuesday as trade talks remained in the spotlight in a week that will see key readings on U.S. inflation and bank earnings.】

item.title: 美国关税风险加剧，中国第二季度GDP增速仍超预期
item.description: 中国经济增长速度略高于预期，显示出在美国关税面前的韧性，但分析师警告说，不利因素正在加剧，这将增加决策者推出更多刺激措施的压力。【原文：China’s economy grew at a slightly faster pace than expected, showing resilience in the face of U.S. tariffs, though analysts warn of intensifying headwinds that will ramp up pressure on policymakers to roll out more stimulus.】

item.title: 英伟达恢复向北京销售 H20 GPU 芯片，并推出符合中国标准的机型
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周一表示，将恢复向中国销售其 H20 图形处理器（GPU）芯片，并推出了一款为满足中国市场监管要求而定制的新机型。【原文：Nvidia said on Monday that it will resume sales of its H20 graphics processing unit (GPU) chips to China and has introduced a new model tailored to meet regulatory requirements in the Chinese market.】

item.title: 中国 6 月新房价格创 8 个月来最快月度降幅
item.description: 周二的官方数据显示，中国 6 月份新房价格创下 8 个月来最快月度降幅，这凸显出即使在多轮支持政策出台后，政策制定者在重振这一低迷行业的需求方面仍面临挑战。【原文：China's new home prices in June fell at the fastest monthly pace in eight months, official data showed on Tuesday, underscoring the challenges policymakers face in reviving demand in the sluggish sector even after multiple rounds of support policies.】

item.title: 调查显示：澳大利亚七月消费者乐观情绪受利率意外影响
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，7月份澳大利亚消费者情绪略有改善，但对经济的乐观情绪因央行决定不降息而有所减弱。【原文：A measure of Australian consumer sentiment improved marginally in July, a survey showed on Tuesday, though optimism on the economy was tempered by a central bank decision to skip a cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 市场考虑潜在制裁和关税，石油价格下跌
item.description: 由于市场消化了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）要求俄罗斯在50天内结束乌克兰战争并避免对其石油买家实施制裁的最后期限，同时对特朗普贸易关税的担忧继续挥之不去，周二油价略有下跌。【原文：Oil prices edged down on Tuesday as the market digested U.S. President Donald Trump's 50-day deadline for Russia to end the Ukraine war and avoid sanctions on buyers of its oil, while worries continued to linger over Trump's trade tariffs.】

item.title: 大批员工外流后，美国机构缩减裁员计划
item.description: 一位人事官员周一表示，在数万名员工接受买断或提前退休以避免被解雇后，特朗普政府将减少联邦工作人员的裁员计划。【原文：The Trump administration will reduce planned federal worker layoffs, a personnel official said on Monday, after tens of thousands of employees accepted buyouts or retired early to avoid dismissal.】

item.title: 中国中央电视台称英伟达首席执行官将出席中国供应链博览会
item.description: 中国中央电视台周二称，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋将于周三出席中国国际供应链博览会开幕式。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang will attend the opening ceremony of China's international supply chain expo on Wednesday, Chinese state broadcaster CCTV said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 尽管征收关税，但亚洲传统汽车制造商仍以美国为先
item.description: 丰田汽车和现代汽车可能对美国的保护主义心存芥蒂，但它们与唐纳德-特朗普总统有一个共同点：在全球汽车市场上，亚洲的传统汽车制造商都是美国优先。【原文：Toyota and Hyundai Motor may have a beef with U.S. protectionism, but they have one thing in common with President Donald Trump: when it comes to global car markets, it's America first for Asia's legacy automakers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚希望取消大部分银行卡支付附加费
item.description: 澳大利亚中央银行周二建议取消对消费者的大部分借记卡和信用卡支付附加费，同时降低企业支付的交换费，这些措施每年将为这两个群体节省约 24 亿澳元（15.7 亿美元）。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday proposed to scrap surcharges on most debit and credit card payments for consumers while lowering interchange fees paid by businesses, steps that would save the two groups around A$2.4 billion ($1.57 billion) a year.】

item.title: 研究公司称，尽管北美市场举步维艰，但 6 月份全球电动汽车销量仍猛增 24
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周二表示，由于中国和欧洲向电动汽车转换的势头保持良好，6 月份全球电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的销量比去年同期猛增 24%。【原文：Global sales of electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles jumped 24% in June from a year ago, as a switch to electric vehicles maintained momentum in China and Europe, market research firm Rho Motion said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国关税压力增大，中国第二季度经济增速将放缓
item.description: 由于贸易紧张局势和房地产长期低迷拖累了需求，中国经济在经历了年初的稳健增长后，很可能在第二季度出现降温，从而加大了政策制定者推出额外刺激措施以支撑经济增长的压力。【原文：China's economy is likely to have cooled in the second quarter after a solid start to the year, as trade tensions and a prolonged property downturn drag on demand, raising pressure on policymakers to roll out additional stimulus to underpin growth.】

item.title: 新西兰央行称，新西兰老年人的行为将影响利率和资产价格
item.description: 新西兰中央银行在周二发布的一份报告中说，随着人口老龄化，新西兰的储蓄、借贷和投资行为可能会发生变化，从而影响利率、资产价格和对金融产品的需求。【原文：New Zealand’s savings, borrowing and investment behaviour is likely to change as its population ages, affecting interest rates, asset prices and demand for financial products, New Zealand’s central bank said in a report released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，洛克希德-马丁公司交付 72 架面临升级延误的 F-35 喷气式战斗机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引五角大楼项目办公室的消息报道，洛克希德-马丁公司已经向美国政府交付了72架F-35喷气式战斗机，截至5月1日，由于软件改进不及时，交付时间推迟了几个月。【原文：Lockheed Martin has delivered 72 F-35 jets to the U.S. government as of May 1, after several months of delay due to late software improvements, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing the Pentagon's program office.】
